subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had 33 points and 10 assists, Chris Bosh scored 30 points and the Heat used a third-quarter turnaround to erase what was a 17-point deficit and beat the Spurs, 120-98.
snippet: LeBron James had 33 points and 10 assists, Chris Bosh scored 30 points and the Heat used a third-quarter turnaround to erase what was a 17-point deficit and beat the Spurs, 120-98.
